jobDescription: Provide IT strategy consulting services, perform application security assessments, develop security policies, deliver client presentations, manage engagements, perform IT security assessments (vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, etc.), conduct mobile application security assessments, provide security requirements for testing, perform web application and thick client application security assessments, participate in application security tool deployments, develop IT security and testing from a risk management perspective, perform SAST and DAST, utilize tools like Metasploit, Kali Linux, and Nmap.
requiredSkills: Mobile Application Security Assessment (iOS, Android, Windows)
IT Security Assessment (Mobile/Digital Wallets, UPI, Payment Gateways)
Open Source Security Testing Methodology Manual
